results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) = k*n + k - n, 1 <= k <= n.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Rows n = 1..120 of triangle, flattened
program: a209297 n k = k * n + k - n
(GAP) Flat(List([1..10^3], n -> List([1..n], k -> k * n + k - n))); # _Muniru A Asiru_, Oct 31 2017
xref: Cf. A162610; A000012 (left edge), A000290 (right edge), A006003 (row sums), A001844 (central terms), A026741 (number of odd terms per row), A142150 (number of even terms per row), A221490 (number of primes per row).
